Hello everyone :wave: This is Samy from <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/19997099/marketplace/apps/whatsapp-HubSpot-integration|Rasayel>

We are experimenting with the new Custom Channels API. We created an app with scopes: `conversations.custom_channels.read` and `conversations.custom_channels.write` .

Then created a test account for that app, but when trying to connect we get the following error:  "Authorization failed because this account doesn't have access to the scopes required by the app. Please contact HubSpot support."

Worth mentioned that the issue isn't with the OAuth flow itself as we already have it working but we just added these two scopes, for more info that's the App ID: 3534852, Test Account ID: 145175307

Do you guys can assist us on this?
<@UQNEXHW14> <@U03MLCLS5BN> Your thoughts here will be more than appreciated and helpful :heart:
Also, here is a video of us attempting it:
Having the same problem with my production and test accounts
Hey <@U07NSFM6BFA> our team is all at INBOUND this week so will be slow to reply. I think <@U04B32JHTUZ> might be best suited to assist here though

Hey gang, so sorry you are running into this. Someone reached out to me on LinkedIn with the same issue. I wonder if it has to do with some changes we made in making these scopes more broadly available as we shifted from private to public beta. I've forwarded on to my development team to investigate. No timeline yet but will keep you posted!
Hey guys, we know what's wrong. It just has to do with the rollout from private to public beta, and we're working on a fix for it now. We'll keep you up to date with a fix timeline
